composer.rawText:
[Title: Two Tones, One Reset]
[Theme: Random]
[Variation: Random 2]
[Gradients: 2]
[Seed: 86]
[Style: minimalist instrumental, soloist and accompanist, experimental ambient, glass textures, clean studio recording]
[Image: soft two-color gradient with subtle motion]
[Caption: A minimal refresh — same idea, new breath.]
[Created: January 25, 2026 at 8:40 PM]
[Composer Version: v1.0]

[Intro]
[Glass harmonica enters alone, slow sustained tones, wide stereo.]

[Development]
[Analog modular synth fades in beneath, low harmonic pulse, gentle filter movement.]

[Refresh]
[The opening motif repeats with slight timing variation, as if reloaded.]

[Ending]
[The synth drops out first, leaving a single glass harmonic that fades into silence.]

sections.notesRaw: Glass harmonica enters alone, slow sustained tones, wide stereo.
Analog modular synth fades in beneath, low harmonic pulse, gentle filter movement.
The opening motif repeats with slight timing variation, as if reloaded.
The synth drops out first, leaving a single glass harmonic that fades into silence.
